antiPatterns.name: Bottleneck Service
antiPatterns.description: This antipattern describes a service that is being used by too many external clients resulting in high response times and low availability of this service.
antiPatterns.context: A service is being used by too many external clients.
antiPatterns.consequences: High response times and low availability of this service.
sources: @inproceedings{nayrolles2013improving, title={Improving SOA antipatterns detection in Service Based Systems by mining execution traces}, author={Nayrolles, Mathieu and Moha, Naouel and Valtchev, Petko}, booktitle={Reverse Engineering (WCRE), 2013 20th Working Conference on}, pages={321--330}, year={2013}, doi={10.1109/WCRE.2013.6671307}, organization={IEEE}}
